Summary: Bright light flying west to east then turned north east. My buddy flys anything with wings even he said that is no plane he knows of.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my buddy was setting in my swing watching the sky and having a beer. I saw a star ? Then I said my eyes messing with me or is that star moving, then it drifted north so then we knew it was moving it traveled toward us then curved to the north east went behind trees. My buddy the jet pilot was using binoculars he said that no plane he knows of. It looked round and bright white light after it turned north the shape and light did not change. You tell us what did we see you are the experts.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Conway
There was one other sighting in Conway on or around October 10th 2013
